name: Just An Ordinary Game
description:
Just An Ordinary Game is a title developed by Kareeb Hassan in partnership with FUNSOFT TECHNOLOGIES.  This game contains a lot of meme content and is similar to those flash games you've probably seen or played before. It contains MEMES, FUN, and plenty of parts to laugh at and the best part is- it's COMPLETELY FREE! That's right! You can just download it with no issues given!

(PLEASE NOTE: FUNSOFT TECHNOLOGIES is not responsible for any death, injury, or psychological damage given by both the game and the company. Kareeb Hassan is not able to give or clarify unknown information. If you see an unexpected occurrence while playing. It is best recommended you delete the game immediately. Any word spread of the occurrence and/or FUNSOFT will result in prosecution of death.)
